title: Celtics Give It All For KD?
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and Israel Gutierrez debate if the Celtics should give the Nets a godfather offer for Kevin Durant and what they make of Draymond's comments about the 2017 Warriors and the 1998 Bulls.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): Should The Celtics Make The Nets An Offer They Can't Refuse For KD?
